titleStmt.title: Ane satyre of the thrie estaits in commendation of vertew and vituperation of vyce. / Maid be Sir Dauid Lindesay of the Mont, aliàs, Lyon King of Armes.
titleStmt.author: Lindsay, David, Sir, fl. 1490-1555.

titleStmt.title: Ane satyre of the thrie estaits in commendation of vertew and vituperation of vyce. / Maid be Sir Dauid Lindesay of the Mont, aliàs, Lyon King of Armes.
titleStmt.author: Lindsay, David, Sir, fl. 1490-1555.

notesStmt.note: At foot of title, "Cum priuilegio Regis." Another issue (STC 15681) lacks this.
P. 72 misnumbered 54. Variant: P. 72 numbered correctly.
Item at reel 1278:13 identified as STC 15681.
Reproductions of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (photocopy) and Bodleian Library.
